Package game.items

Class Bottle

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
game.items.Bottle
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.capabilities.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Printable
public class Bottle
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
This class represents magical bottle in the game that can contains unlimited water permanent item that cannot be dropped or picked up. This bottle can be filled with water, and player can drink/consume the water inside the bottle. Each water will give a unique effect depending on its original source
